name: Sanjha Pizza and Curry House
address: 7093 King George Blvd, Surrey, BC V3W 5A2, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Fries

review.reviewBody: Best pepperoni pizza,  asked for extra sauce, followed instructions. Best pizza I've had

lambchopes were overheated and was fully blacked up and severed as unhealthy so food was not aprreciatebale  as somebody said to order lambchopes from sanjha so I did and result is will not order ever again
Honestly the best pizza im ever had!
